posts.post_text:
What an inspiring day! We're thrilled to announce that Shoppers Drug Mart proudly presented $1.7 million to Shoppers Foundation for Women's Health at our 37th annual Charity Golf Classic yesterday.

This incredible achievement wouldn't be possible without the unwavering support of our valued vendors and dedicated colleagues who teed off with us for a vital cause: women's health equity.
